website_summaries.verdict: Vegan, whole-foods based zinc supplement with 100% daily value of vitamin C.
pros: Can take on an empty stomach unlike most zinc supplements
Helps with acne and immunity – clears up skin and colds faster
cons: Unclear what kind of zinc this product contains, which can determine absorbability

customer_reviews.title: Caused mouth sores
customer_reviews.text: This form of zing caused mouth sores within days of taking it. It felt like little cuts all along the gum line which only healed after stopping this product. I'll go back to regular Zinc product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed! Great immune booster
customer_reviews.text: Zinc is incredible. I used to get sick rather easily, I’m in college so around hundreds of people per day. I heard zinc could help the immune system and I was desperate so I gave it a try. I took the white zinc pills from a drug store, which did help my immune system too, but these vitamin code zinc pills help my sleep too. My immune system is much stronger since taking this. My boyfriend and roommate recently got the flu but somehow I didn’t and I’m convinced it’s because this zinc. Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Landon Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I take this along with a vitamin D supplement and I feel its helped heal my hormonal acne. I"ve also noticed an increase in hair and nail growth
customer_reviews.author: Mish83

customer_reviews.title: Best choice, most effective
customer_reviews.text: Was using an opti-zinc before this. This is much better. I now have clearer focus stronger immune function and less B.O. This is easily the best zinc suppliment that i have used seems to be more effective. Awesome for during cold & flu season. Men need this more as well because every time we urinate we lose some zinc if we had any to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Cee DeLoy

customer_reviews.title: Rated #1 on Labdoor
customer_reviews.text: My doctor did a blood test to determine I was low on zinc. She recommended a specific brand, but I wasn't impressed with her recommendation. I normally use labdoor for making my supplement determinations since they do 3rd party testing. Labdoor rated Vitamin Code with a 95.8 (the highest rated zinc supplement)...that plus the relatively inexpensive price compared to competitors drove my decision to choose this Zinc supplement over others.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: An amazing supplement to fight colds.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help with immune function and hopefully avoid those pesky cold and flu seasons. I take this product usually about every day and a half. This is probably my 5th bottle because I believe it works and works well. I increase my intake when I am sick to help shorten the duration and intenstiy of my cold. I would not say it's been flawless but there are many other factors to account for. I would have to say that it has helped immensely in boosting my resilience to colds. Just an fyi for people viewing this product but garden of life was bought by Nestle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my dry heels
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these for several weeks. I noticed within the first 1-2 weeks that the dry skin on my heels went away (I've been using lotions and scrubs, for years, without results). I love that these help my skin heal so quickly (even breakouts on my face). Will continue to use this product. I try to take it with a meal, for better absorption, but haven't felt ill if taken on an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: ShabbyDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: The best zinc... it’s always a reorder for me! Since I’ve been taking this, my sense of taste and smell has improved SO MUCH! I also feels warmth in my hands and feet. My whole body seems to have energy and strength returning.. plus my vision is restoring.. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gustavson

customer_reviews.title: Great for hormonal acne
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this from last six months and I have noticed that my hormonal acne problems almost gone. It’s little hard to swallow for me but trust me you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: resh

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This product made me sick. When I say sick my skin color was off and upset stomach. Nauseous too. Too much zinc for my system. When I went off it I noticed improvements immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this s couple months ago and it worked great! But I decided to try a different brand that was cheaper...two different times. And neither worked as good for my acne as this! It clears my face right up!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Blanton

customer_reviews.title: The upside is it's not expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The downside is I don't think it works for colds. I've ordered 2 bottles of this stuff which is a 4 month supply. Took it everyday and about a week later I got a cold. I'll just stick to taking regular Vitamin C and Zinc pills now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this a week ago, so my feedback could change in a month from now. So far I like what I see. It doesn't upset my stomach which is a huge plus- I've had trouble in the past with other vitamins upsetting my stomach. I purchased this vitamin with the big intent on helping to clear up my acne, and I have noticed my face clearing up slightly which I'm really excited about! I also like the ingredients listed. Like I said, it's only been a week so my opinion could change so I'll try to return to give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Like other GOL products, this is a raw whole food multivitamin, meaning all of its contents will be absorbed into the body. I didn't consider any other brand/producer, and I'm happy I was so wise. I purchased it because my testosterone is on the lower side of normal for my age, and I have been experienced fatigue and decreased libido. I find the fatigue to be far less, and my libido is literally as though I were in my late teens. I love this product, and just purchased my second month's supply. I highly recommend this, especially if you are taking it for concerns related to male health.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer1994

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of too much zinc
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. Not sure if it was the product but when I started taking it I had abdominal pain for four days!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to improve hair and nail health
customer_reviews.text: I have experience zinc deficiency over the years and tried various brand supplements to help with this issue. I was once again experiencing weak, white spotted nails, and hair loss (after several years of no issues) so I ordered these zinc capsules. These worked really well for me and within a few weeks I have almost no spots left on my nails and my hair loss has returned to a normal amount for a woman with long hair. Hoping they'll be back in stock soon so I can continue taking them to strengthen my nails and regrow hair.
customer_reviews.author: Larelle M.

customer_reviews.title: This product made my cystic acne flare up the worse it's ever been
customer_reviews.text: This product made my cystic acne flare up the worse it's ever been. Giving 2 stars because this product could be a detoxer and its pushing out the toxins but I can't deal with that level of stress all of a sudden. It's been about 2 weeks and my skin looks horrible
customer_reviews.author: Koda Gustav

customer_reviews.title: I've taking it for a week and a half and my mouth sores are getting worse.. I just read another person had the ...
customer_reviews.text: It caused me to get mouth sores. I've taking it for a week and a half and my mouth sores are getting worse.. I just read another person had the same problem.. I am stopping it ASAP! BAD BAD BAD DON'T TAKE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can’t live without this!
customer_reviews.text: I LIVE BY THIS ! Every time I am coming down with a possible cold, I take Two since and in 24 hours I don’t feel any symptoms. This is not a magic pill, but, it does help reinforce the body to fight off colds! I also take it on a week where I might be traveling and want to make sure my immune system is strong. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DZam

customer_reviews.title: unbelievable! Wait time & broken items.  More than once so far this week.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a jiffy again!! It seems the norm now days. Broken box. Broken cap on bottle!! Really? Prime? Wait time 2 plus weeks to receive a product I am not sure is safe to take because is crack ( the cap).
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I am going to order again. It may be b/c I graduated from college and started taking this the last month of my classes due to Covid-19 but man, I had so much energy after a month of taking this and when I was moving. My friend told me she never saw me move so much since living with her.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking these for over a month and almost immediately I saw an improvement in my skin. I originally purchased these after experiencing breakouts on my face for months out of nowhere. I had tried so many different products and regimens and I was becoming extremely discouraged. So after careful research I found these pills and decided to give them a try. It's Heaven in a tiny pill. My face is almost blemish free. I haven't experienced any new breakouts and my skin even naturally looks brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ke'Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great for mental clarity
customer_reviews.text: I used these for weeks and definitely felt a difference. This is especially the case when I combined with biotin. My hair was coming back thicker and my mind was ay clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Nooruddin

customer_reviews.title: Great source of Zinc with added Vit C for strong immune system
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this Zinc pills for an oral non -liquid vitamin. I’ve started taking Zinc since COVID Became a pandemic, as I’m in healthcare. Me and my husband take this one - and I give a liquid zinc version to kids. I like this supplement as it also has added Vit C. It’s not a gigantic pill to swallow and doesn’t have any taste, so I’m not gagging every time. For COVID prophylaxis I take zinc, Vit D, C and melatonin.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina R

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product, just not for me
customer_reviews.text: A one star rating is not quite fair. This is an awesome product, just not for me. I do not know if it was the probiotic or what, but my system reacted in a bad way. For this reason, am not using and should return.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and it has really helped reduce my acne by at least 85%
customer_reviews.author: Jia Pierre-Louis

customer_reviews.title: No illnesses in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I began taking these after I my re-activation of Epstein Barr Virus (Mono x2) in December, NOT only did it help with suppressing The mono, but I haven’t been sick from any other sickness (like colds and flus) either!!! I take half the recommended does every day (one pill) and I have not been sick at all in 6 months! THIS IS A BIG DEAL FOR ME BECAUSE I USE TO ALWAYS BE SICK!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Golden

customer_reviews.title: Got breakout
customer_reviews.text: I dont see any improvement just yet because after the first day I got breakout on my back. Just wont figure out until after 3 more days, my back has a lot of more red swollen spots and pain from those spots. I stopped the supplement for 3 days now still having the affect but less, it get to my face now. Hopefully it stop for good. I bought 3 bottles and give it for my friend, she had the same reaction on her body. just be careful I dont say it’s bad cus I dont know for sure and maybe my and my friend’s body wont go along with this zinc.
customer_reviews.author: Thao Le

customer_reviews.title: No stomach issues!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and only zinc I've been able to take with not queasy stomach. I had given up on zinc supplements but thought I would try this one. I already use this brand for about 90% and I LOVE this brand. A little pricy but I'm not peeing my vitamins in the toilet like all the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing with consistent use!
customer_reviews.text: 28 year old esthetician here! I suffered with inflammed acne throughout my childhood and young adulthood. When I became an esthetician at 25, I gained access to professional skincare that really helped clear up the inflammation. The past three years, I've really only dealt with hormonal acne once a month because you know - mother nature. I've been taking this supplement consistently for 3 weeks and my skin looks AMAZING. I barely use any concealer and switched to a super light coverage foundation. This was the last bit to my daily routine that I needed in order to love my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: See the difference in my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after several years of noticing how much better my skin was whenever I used Zicam when I had a cold. I have skin issues and allergies galore so I'm always looking for products that will help. After years of speculating whether zinc helped skin I finally researched it and was pleased to see it did improve skin and possibly acts as an anti-histamine, which I suspect is part of my skin problems since my allergies show in my skin. I think my skin looks better overall, less sensitive and not so blotchy. Will definitely keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie32

customer_reviews.title: I was wrong about this product.
customer_reviews.text: In the past, I thought this was not something I would enjoy but it is actually a great supplement. Powerful and I noticed for my health it works! I believe this is a wholly true ethical product and I recommend this over all other zinc products I've tried (insert list here) on the market.

customer_reviews.title: Protect your self with this product
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to comment on additional information, because there are no laboratory tests and so on. However, I have no problem consuming it :-) ...... Just a good feeling ..... and sence of protection from the virus ....

customer_reviews.text: There's nothing quite like taking zinc, just to feel like you have morning sickness 30 minutes later. There's none of that here!

customer_reviews.text: Been taking this product almost daily for 5+ years. I feel like it boosts my immune system and keeps any colds/viruses from dragging out into serious infections. 2 years ago I realized that it included Raw Probiotic & Enzyme blend, even more beneficial that I originally realized.

customer_reviews.text: My overall experience is good so far. Got better mood and immune support.

customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many brands of vitamins. They all made me feel like I had to vomit until I found vitamin code! I’ve starred taking the zinc pill and seen a small difference in my adult acne. My breakouts aren’t as heavy if not there at all!
customer_reviews.author: JEANNIE S.

customer_reviews.title: It works well!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had hormonal/cystic acne since I was 14 and for years I relied on birth control because that's what I found to make my acne stop completely but now that I'm pregnant I obviously had to stop taking birth control and I started breaking out bad like I used to. I now have been taking this and the probiotics in the same brand and I haven't had any break outs! 😁 just left with the scars now unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Love these, even got not pregnant times
customer_reviews.text: Love these!!! I have a very sensitive runny and these are great, even if you're not prego! Also, they're capsules and I think free from papaya and pineapple (I'm allergic). I like the added ginger as it helps my sensitive tummy. I have methylation issues and this made it so I don't have to take a ton of vitamins, only one multi and a few extras. Really appreciate these!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Manda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, Easy to Swallow
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this product over six weeks ago, on the advice of a medical professional in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. It is a high-quality product that is easy to swallow and leaves no aftertaste. It is now part of my daily supplement regimen forever. I also appreciate the fact that it is reasonably priced. Thank you, Garden of Life!
customer_reviews.author: Daria Anne DiGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Only 20 pills in bottle supposed to have 60
customer_reviews.text: Only 20 pills came in sealed bottle that was supposed to have 60. This is criminal. Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Sack

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I bought it because I almost choked to death on 2 different brands of uncoated zinc tablets that stick in the throat because they start dissolving before it can be swallowed. These are in gel capsules, although quite large they slide right down even taking 2 at a time. The capsules are clear & the ingredient looks like ground up dried food, which is what it is suppose to be. I take them an hour before bedtime to help me sleep & I think they help my immune system & promote clearer thinking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: this is a must have in your medicine cabinet! i take them before i feel like i'm getting sick. i never get sick with these!! the brand is amazing too, the best on the market in our opinon. we buy everything from them for vitamins and supplements. i would recommend only taking one in the morning and one at night, and with a meal. i sometimes get sick if i take them on an empty stomach, and zinc can cause nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Lbrown

customer_reviews.title: Reputable brand quality zinc suppliment
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing this zinc to fill a deficiency I had that I believed was causing a small amount of acne on my face. I have used this for over 6 months and it has seemingly cleared my face of acne. When I don't take it for several days the acne begins to return. I tried other brands zinc suppliments and they also worked at clearing my acne, but they upset my stomach. Garden of Life brand is certified organic and vegan...not sure if that's why they don't upset my stomach...but I have never had an upset stomach taking this brand zinc.
customer_reviews.author: The art guy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not much for raving about supplements but I just had to sing the praises of Garden of Life zinc! My dr told me, on my previous visit, that my D & zinc levels were low, which of course had me concerned these days. I’m now on my second bottle of this brand and he was very impressed with how quickly my numbers improved. They’re easy to swallow, no taste and obviously do their job as far as absorbency is concerned. I love the fact that they come in a dark glass bottle in order to preserve the product’s quality. I would highly recommend this to be your brand of choice. Definitely a great value!!
customer_reviews.author: Corlyn

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - NOT VEGAN
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE, CHECK THE LIST OF INGREDIENTS, IT HAS lactobacillus , LACTOSE . IS CAN NOT BE CALLED VEGAN. GOT 2 CAPSULES (1 serving )AND START THROWING UP , ( 5 years on vegan menu,. 95% raw vegan) MY BODY CAN DETECT VERY WELL IF IT IS SOMETHING THAT DOESN'T BELONG TO MY SYSTEM. CHECK FULL LIST OF INGREDIENTS, BE CAREFULLY WHAT YOU PUT IN.

It's especially important for resistance to covid-19 in my opinion. I would recommend this brand because its manufacturing is superior to other brands.

Love this product and will be purchasing again great for skin and eye health, immune system health and so much more! Great product overall

It is great. I feel better within minutes. I have had weight loss surgery so the fact that it absorbs so well in my system is a big deal. I'll definitely be keeping a supply of these on hand.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as I expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try based on other reviews. I was having some small itchy skin rashes appear on my legs where my house dog sleeps by my legs at night and I thought I was becoming allergic to him despite all his baths, poor guy!! Anyways I started taking this as directed and the itchy spots disappeared after a week so now less baths for the dog and no more scratching!! Zinc deficiency does cause different types of skin lesions so if your having issues might give it a try!

customer_reviews.title: Best non-GMO zinc at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This zinc is incredible! If I have a hint of a cold or feeling allergy symptoms, I add this to my vitamin routine. Within a day or two, my symptoms resolve or lessen dramatically. I can’t claim it’s a cure but it helps my immune system. Also, with all Garden Of Life products, the ingredients are ones I can understand and trust. This product is non-GMO and NSF certified. I can’t recommend this zinc more!

I haven't noticed any cognitive benefits (after 3 bottles) but they work well along with vitamin C to keep me from getting sick and that's worth a lot too. I will be buying more.

customer_reviews.text: I am 50. I had a blood test that showed low free testosterone. I used this with Alpha Lipoic Acid and magnesium supplement and ASRESEARCH TDrive. After about 3 months the test results showed that my free testosterone was high. I don't remember the remember the actual values from the blood test. My son started taking the Vitamin Code Raw Zinc with Esther-C for a sinus infection. They went away in four or five days without the use of antibiotics. He had the science infection for about four or five days before taking the the Vitamin Code Raw Zinc without any progress.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good zinc
customer_reviews.text: I love that these also come with probiotics in them. So far since taking them for a month I did notice a difference in my immunity and gut health. Will definitely buy these again. If your looking for a higher dose of zinc I wouldn’t buy these though Because they are a low 30mg. I know some of my friends like 50mg at a time.
customer_reviews.author: KacyS

customer_reviews.title: Zinc capsules
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues with these Zinc capsules, which I take daily. No smell, no taste, no upset stomach. I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as always with garden of life. What is exceptional about these pills is that the pills themselves actually have a nice flavor! What a pleasant surprise!
customer_reviews.author: Beneficial Ear

customer_reviews.title: YES PLEASE!
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep zinc in the house. When I stopped taking them for a little while I ended up with a cold, as soon as the symptoms started I began taking my zinc again and a cold that would’ve lasted weeks lasted me all of three days. Had I never stopped taking them I know I would’ve never gotten sick in the first place. Zinc is a must have. ESPECIALLY this zinc!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Miller

customer_reviews.title: It is in capsule so it is easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.text: We use it doing the flu season and it seems to help the effects of the flu. I was told by my doctor to use 60 mg during the flue season. It is in capsule so it is easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Findley

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the soft capsule is so easy to swallow and tasteless, so I don't have to worry about gaging reflects. I love this product, makes me feel so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Joselynn

customer_reviews.title: Open minded perspective
customer_reviews.text: Tablets are easy to swallow; there really isn’t any taste issues that one should be concerned about and the absorbency appears to be fine. Just keep in mind that the body will eventually adapt and adjust to whatever it consumes. So with that being said something may be very effective at immediate conception but over time it becomes less effective due to body adaptations and adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando S.

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was zinc
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was zinc, it's got 'probiotics' and other stuff I'm not going to take. I just wanted zinc.
customer_reviews.author: scottalias

customer_reviews.title: Did not effect Zinc levels
customer_reviews.text: This item was ineffective. My zinc level did not improve at all after taking the entire bottle, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredient list...
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredient list, which makes me feel good about what’s going in my body. I’m learning about the impact of zinc on our skin and I’m very pleased with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I want and more. Only one complaint. It's almost impossible to get the bottle open. PLEASE! Make a lid that's easy to screw off.
customer_reviews.author: DTB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Important preventative for immune system, especially respiratory ailments. (Covid-19). Taken as directed it will not hurt you and it certainly can’t hurt.
customer_reviews.author: tidyslipknot

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, especially since it is food based. Good quality and it comes in a glass container!!! My skin has really improved since taking it. Apparently we are all lacking Zinc!! Who knew!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Glass was broken, half of bottle spilled out.
customer_reviews.text: My complaint isn't really about the product, but about the fact that I received it broken. I would have gone directly to the site for help, but the link listed for customer service doesn't work. I normally like this product but feel like I wasted my money this time.
customer_reviews.author: angry bird

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement if you are experiencing any gut issues. I purchased this item because is recommended for women with endometriosis. Ever since I have been taking this supplement my tummy feels great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: LabDoor is no1!
customer_reviews.text: LabDoor rated this no1 zinc product! No upset stomach or any side effects!!! No complaints!!!
customer_reviews.author: ami h

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get the flu....
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! I saw my immune system strengthen (my kids and husband got both strains of the flu and I didn’t) and my face cleared up! Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: mrschei

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used to get canker sores in my mouth until I started taking zinc. I haven’t had one in years now. I also haven’t gotten Covid-19, and I am in a hotspot. I can’t speak to the COVID but I am sure it helped with the canker sores.
customer_reviews.author: Danski

customer_reviews.title: I love this vitamin
customer_reviews.text: It has so many good ingredients, probiotics and this supplement really boosts your immune system. It will prevent you from catching a cold. Powerful since and Whole Foods!
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product. I bought it to help with brittle ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product. I bought it to help with brittle nails. I’ve been taking it for a month and it noticely improved my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: good manufacture
customer_reviews.text: I gave it four stars because it's garden of life, very good manufacture, Hoping it helps w/my hair from falling out from chemo. I know it won't stop it but maybe slow it down
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I love these . Zink is so important for men and women. I like these because they come in with veggies and 30 mg is in two caps, so I control how much I want to take.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with my Addison's. I like the high potency. I believe I will by again.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Finally a zinc tou can take without food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only zinc I've been able to take on an empty stomach. Love the ingredients used and pleasant taste too. Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: IJ

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Vitamin Code Raw Zinc, 30mg Whole Food Zinc Supplement + Vitamin C, Trace Minerals & Probiotics for Immune Support, Certified Vegan Non-GMO & Gluten Free Zinc Supplements, 60 Capsules
product_meta.description:
Go beyond vitamins and minerals with Vitamin Code RAW Zinc Formula, providing RAW Food-Created Nutrients to support immune system function, healthy wound recovery and DNA synthesis, plus skin, eye and prostate health.

BRAND STORY
By Garden of Life
feature_bullets: Zinc with Vitamin C: Our Zinc supplement provides whole food nutrition with 30mg of RAW Zinc (over 250% of the new Daily Value) plus 60mg of RAW Vitamin C, both in a Whole Food form for optimal nutrient absorption and utilization

Natural Cofactors: Raw Organic fruits & vegetables, alkalizing trace minerals and probiotics & enzymes add additional antioxidants, vitamins and cofactors to Vitamin Code Vegan Zinc pills, enabling the natural recognition of nutrients by your body, as nature intended

Why Raw Zinc? RAW means these Zinc pills are made without high heat, and they contain no synthetic or filler ingredients - just Raw, food created nutrients for immune system support, skin health and eye health, as well as prostate health
Probiotics & Enzymes: Our plant based Zinc vitamin includes a Raw Probiotic and Enzyme blend for added digestive support
Vegan Zinc: Our real food Raw Zinc supplement is Third-Party Certified Vegan, Non-GMO Project Verified, NSF Gluten Free and Star K Kosher

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
